titles.title: To deny a rebate of Federal income taxes to illegal immigrants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E177)
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
2/7/2008--Introduced.
Renders nonresident aliens ineligible for any federal income tax rebate enacted by Congress in 2008. Prohibits the payment of any tax rebate to an individual who does not include a valid identification number (i.e., social security number) on a tax return.
